answers.whatIsRaflyAnswer: üìù Rafly is a marketplace specialized in selling digital products. You'll find templates, graphic files, developer resources and much more.
answers.howToBuyAnswer: üìù Simply browse the catalog, add a product to your cart and complete your purchase via available payment methods.
answers.productTypesAnswer: üìù Rafly offers various digital files: website templates, graphic elements, ebooks, presets, plugins, etc.
answers.immediateAccessAnswer: üìù Yes, as soon as your payment is validated, you can download your files directly from your account.
answers.sellProductsAnswer: üìù Yes! Rafly allows creators to sell their digital products. Contact us to learn more.
answers.paymentMethodsAnswer: üìù We accept payments by credit card, mobile money and other solutions adapted to Africa.
answers.refundsAnswer: üìù Since digital products are downloadable immediately, refunds are subject to certain conditions. Check our refund policy for more details.
answers.fileProblemsAnswer: üìù Contact our support, we'll do our best to help you or find a solution with the seller.
answers.promotionsAnswer: üìù Yes, we regularly organize special offers. Stay connected so you don't miss anything!
answers.contactSupportAnswer: üìù You can write to us via the site's contact page or directly by email.

hero.title: Rafly, the platform that transforms beginners into successful sellers.
hero.description: We don't just sell digital products. We provide weapons to win: validated products, concrete strategies, and a community that takes action. Launch your business today, without getting lost along the way.

whatIsRafly.title: What is Rafly? And why will you love it?
whatIsRafly.description: Rafly was born from a real and personal need, directly experienced by a field e-commerce entrepreneur. Before Rafly, selling a digital product was a real obstacle course.

problems.problem1: ...you had to spend hours scrolling on Facebook
problems.problem2: ... hope to find an interesting product then waste time looking for a good graphic designer
problems.problem3: ...wait days to receive sometimes disappointing visuals
problems.summary: In short, a lot of time wasted, for few results.

solution.intro: It's by experiencing all these obstacles that a simple idea was born:
solution.idea: What if a single platform could take care of everything
solution.description: Rafly is therefore this solution: an all-in-one tool designed to save you time, accelerate your sales and focus only on what really matters: selling.
solution.mission: Our mission: make digital business simple, fast and profitable for everyone.
solution.intro2: Whether you're a beginner or already launched, Rafly gives you direct access to:

features.feature1: tested, sorted and validated digital products
features.feature3: concrete strategies to get started, without complicating things

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.subtitle: Discover how we protect your personal data and respect your privacy.

section1.title: 1. PERSONAL DATA PROTECTION
section1.paragraph1: Rafly.me attaches particular importance to the confidentiality of its users' information. When a user accesses the platform and purchases a digital product, certain personal data may be collected, notably the email address and username.
section1.paragraph2: This information is strictly used to provide access to purchased products and to ensure follow-up when needed. Rafly.me undertakes never to sell, rent or share this information with third parties, except in case of legal obligation.
section1.paragraph3: Users have the right to access, rectify and delete their personal data. Any request in this regard can be addressed via the platform's customer support.
section1.paragraph4: The collected data is stored securely and is only accessible to authorized persons within Rafly.me.

section2.title: 2. USE AND RESALE OF DIGITAL PRODUCTS
section2.paragraph1: All products offered on Rafly.me are white-label digital products. When a user purchases a product, they get immediate access and can exploit it as they wish.
section2.paragraph2: The user is free to resell the digital products purchased on the platform, without restriction. However, it is their responsibility to ensure they comply with applicable laws regarding the resale of digital content.
section2.paragraph3: Rafly.me does not guarantee automatic success in product resale. Profitability will depend on the efforts and strategies implemented by the user.

section3.title: 3. PRODUCT ACCESS CONDITIONS AND SUPPORT
section3.paragraph1: Purchasing a digital product on Rafly.me gives unlimited access to the relevant content. Once the transaction is validated, the user can download or consult the product without time limitation.
section3.paragraph2: Some users choose to subscribe to a subscription plan offered on the platform. These subscriptions give access to specific products and strategies that can help them in their resale.
section3.paragraph3: Rafly.me offers support only to users who have subscribed to a subscription plan. This support may include advice, strategies and additional resources to help the user better exploit the purchased digital products.
section3.paragraph4: Users who purchase individual products do not have access to this support and must manage the resale and exploitation of products autonomously.

section4.title: 4. REFUND POLICY
section4.paragraph1: Since digital products are accessible immediately after purchase, no refund will be granted, except in exceptional cases.
section4.paragraph2: Some products available on Rafly.me display the name and details before purchase.
section4.paragraph3: For mystery products, the product image is partially hidden, but a general description is provided. These products are supposed to be winners, and the user accepts these conditions with full knowledge of the facts.
section4.paragraph4: It is the user's responsibility to carefully read all information provided before proceeding with payment. Once the purchase is made, no refund will be granted, unless the situation is deemed exceptional and valid by Rafly.me.
section4.paragraph5: Any refund request will be examined on a case-by-case basis, and Rafly.me reserves the right to accept or refuse the request.

section5.title: 5. USER RESPONSIBILITY
section5.paragraph1: The user is solely responsible for the use they make of products purchased on Rafly.me.
section5.paragraph2: If the user applies the strategies proposed by Rafly.me as part of a subscription, they may obtain results. However, Rafly.me cannot guarantee precise income or automatic success, as these results depend on the individual efforts of each user.
section5.paragraph3: Rafly.me cannot be held responsible for losses, failures or unachieved results related to the exploitation of products purchased on the platform.

section6.title: 6. SUSPENSION AND TERMINATION
section6.paragraph1: Rafly.me reserves the right to suspend or delete a user account in case of abuse, fraud or non-compliance with these conditions.
section6.paragraph2: A user may decide to terminate their subscription at any time. However, no refund will be granted after subscription, except in exceptional cases mentioned in section 4.

section7.title: 7. GENERAL CONDITIONS MODIFICATIONS
section7.paragraph1: Rafly.me may be required to modify these conditions to guarantee better user protection and ensure proper platform operation.
section7.paragraph2: Any update to the conditions will be communicated to users via the site or by email. Users are invited to regularly consult these conditions to stay informed of possible modifications.
section7.paragraph3: By continuing to use Rafly.me after a conditions update, the user automatically accepts the new provisions.

section8.title: 8. CONDITIONS ACCEPTANCE
section8.paragraph1: By purchasing a digital product or subscribing to a subscription on Rafly.me, the user accepts all the conditions stated in this contract.
section8.paragraph2: Using the platform implies full and complete adherence to these conditions, without possibility of contestation after purchase.
section8.paragraph3: Rafly.me undertakes to provide a service that meets user expectations while guaranteeing total transparency on purchase, resale and support modalities.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights on your personal data, you can contact us:
